a.title: Next Step Day – Reverse Parade on May 8th!

h1.a: Next Step Day – Reverse Parade on May 8th!

section.p: Dear Seniors, One of the great traditions at Tamarac has been to celebrate with our seniors their “next step”. On this day seniors wear t-shirts, sweat shirts, hats, any kind of gear that represents what they will do next year (college, military, work force etc). The school staff also wear their gear from college or military service, it... Read more »

a.title: COVID-19 Parent Application for CARES Child Care Scholarship

h1.a: COVID-19 Parent Application for CARES Child Care Scholarship

section.p: We applaud the action of the Cuomo Administration in developing a plan to provide child care to essential workers at no cost! This allocation of funding for child care for essential workers comes to the state from the federal Coronavirus Aid, Relief, and Economic Security Act (the “CARES Act”), which has provided New York with... Read more »

section.p: ATTENTION HIGH SCHOOL PARENTS AND STUDENTS: Please see the following update regarding AP Exams from Assistant Principal, Mr. Rockwell, and see the link below for further resources provided by College Board: How to Prepare Your Students for the 2020 AP Exams Dear Students and Parents of Those Taking AP Exams-Please make sure you read the... a.title: “Career Exploration Day” Provides Students A Brunswick Virtual Career Fair

h1.a: “Career Exploration Day” Provides Students A Brunswick Virtual Career Fair

section.p: Despite our recent extended closure, Brunswick CSD works diligently to recreate academic and extracurricular activities that students would have experienced throughout the average school year. One of these opportunities that we would like to share with you is our recent “Career Exploration Day” that we held online through our district’s Facebook and Twitter. Here, we... Read more »

article.class: cf post-11619 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky hentry category-district category-elementary-school category-high-school category-middle-school category-news

section.p: Tamarac Community – To continue helping our community members address their mental health and finding ways to support our families and students, our wonderful school social workers and Social-Emotional Committee have created a Social & Emotional Wellness Request Survey. If your child is experiencing an emotional wellness concern, please do not hesitate to reach out... Read more »

article.class: cf post-11608 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky hentry category-district category-elementary-school category-high-school category-middle-school category-news

a.title: UPDATE FROM GOV. CUOMO: NYS Schools Closed Until May 15, 2020

h1.a: UPDATE FROM GOV. CUOMO: NYS Schools Closed Until May 15, 2020

section.p: UPDATE FROM GOV. CUOMO as of April 16, 2020 (PLEASE READ): All New York State schools are to remain closed until May 15, 2020. Brunswick CSD will continue to provide remote learning to our students, meals to our families, and childcare to essential workers during this time period. When we have more information, we will... Read more »

a.title: Grade 7 & 8 Band Inspires Us with “What a Wonderful World”

h1.a: Grade 7 & 8 Band Inspires Us with “What a Wonderful World”

section.p: In the midst of all the difficulties we are facing, one thing is certain to bring us together: MUSIC. Mr. Calistri and the 7/8 Band have brought us the gift of music today by sharing their rendition of, “What a Wonderful World.” To do so, Mr. Calistri wrote a 4-part short arrangement and gave his... Read more »

article.class: cf post-11457 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky hentry category-news

a.title: Child Care Survey for Essential Personnel

h1.a: Child Care Survey for Essential Personnel

section.p: Hoosick Falls Central School District will begin a Child Care Program for students in kindergarten through 6th grade beginning Monday, March 23, for students whose parents work in essential personnel professions. Brunswick Central School District is partnered with Hoosick Falls Central School District and Berlin Central School District for this Child Care Program. Please complete... Read more »

article.class: cf post-11428 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail sticky hentry category-district category-elementary-school category-high-school category-middle-school category-news

a.title: Brunswick CSD Educational Opportunities on our Facebook Page!

h1.a: Brunswick CSD Educational Opportunities on our Facebook Page!

section.p: Calling all Tamarac Families – Are you ready to have some FUN? Just because we can’t be in the classrooms for now DOESN’T mean that we can’t engage in some learning and fun! We wanted to give your students every opportunity to further their education, engage with their teachers and coaches, and have a lot... Read more »

article.class: cf post-11654 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-district category-elementary-school category-news

a.title: Weekly Update from Tamarac Elementary Principal, Mr. Pogue – April 24, 2020

h1.a: Weekly Update from Tamarac Elementary Principal, Mr. Pogue – April 24, 2020

section.p: Dear families of Tamarac Elementary School: As our weeks of being apart continue, I hope you are all well, safe and sound. I continue to believe that the measures we are all taking at this time are absolutely necessary, despite the hardships they impose. It will be a wonderful day when we can all walk back... Read more »

article.class: cf post-11638 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-district category-elementary-school category-high-school category-middle-school category-news

a.title: Tamarac Idols Sing “We are the World”

h1.a: Tamarac Idols Sing “We are the World”

section.p: On March 18th, 2020, ten singers from Tamarac were scheduled to perform in a singing competition to crown our 10th annual Tamarac Idol. American Idol Star Madison VanDenburg was scheduled to judge the competition and perform for the audience with her boyfriend Steven Mallory that evening. Unfortunately, the event had to be postponed due to... Read more »
